name: Virellion
description:
Aim of the game:
Survive as long as possible

How to play:
Use the mouse to dodge and lead enemies towards the recycling bin. Be careful not to hit any PDFs flying out of the ZIP folders! (THEY HURT).

Controls:
Mouse - Move the player
ESC or P - To pause the game and change settings

Notes:
Play in full screen
Have fun and leave some feedback :)
[ Browser version may cause more lag than downloadable build ]
